subject: Physics

topics.title: Electric charges and fields
topics.description: Coulomb’s law, superposition principle, electric field, field lines, dipole, flux, Gauss’s theorem.

topics.title: Electrostatic potential and capacitance
topics.description: Electric potential, potential difference, equipotential surfaces, capacitors, capacitance, series and parallel combination.

topics.title: Current Electricity
topics.description: Drift velocity, Ohm’s law, resistance, resistivity, Kirchhoff’s law, potentiometer.

topics.title: Moving charges and magnetism
topics.description: Biot-Savart law, Ampere’s law, cyclotron, force on current-carrying conductor, moving coil galvanometer.

topics.title: Magnetism and matter
topics.description: Magnetic dipole moment, bar magnet, magnetic field lines.

topics.title: Electromagnetic induction and Alternating current
topics.description: Faraday’s laws, Lenz's Law, self and mutual induction, AC currents, LCR series circuit, resonance, AC generator, transformer.

topics.title: Electromagnetic waves
topics.description: Displacement current, characteristics of EM waves, electromagnetic spectrum.

topics.title: Ray optics and optical instruments
topics.description: Reflection, refraction, mirror formula, lens formula, total internal reflection, microscopes, telescopes.

topics.title: Waves Optics
topics.description: Huygen’s principle, interference, Young’s double-slit experiment, polarization, Brewster’s law.

units.unit_name: Dual Nature of Matter & Radiation, Atoms & Nuclei

topics.title: Dual nature of Radiation and matter
topics.description: Photoelectric effect, Einstein’s photoelectric equation, de-Broglie relation.

topics.title: Atoms
topics.description: Rutherford’s model, Bohr model, energy levels, hydrogen spectrum.

topics.title: Nuclei
topics.description: Nuclear force, binding energy, fission, fusion, radioactivity, half-life.

topics.title: Semiconductor electronics
topics.description: Energy bands, p-type and n-type semiconductors, p-n junction diode, Zener diode, transistor, logic gates.

topics.title: Communication System
topics.description: Elements of communication, propagation of EM waves, modulation, mobile telephony, GPS.
